ComicInfo.Title: Street Crazies; The Parakeet That Outwitted the D.E.A.; The Casebook of Doctor Feelgood; Sheriff Alabama and the Hangin' Tree; #115 [Defective Cars and Incompetent Drivers]; The Mysterious Stranger; The Anal Retentives; No. 111 Honk Therapy; Grace and Grease; Pre-dawn Antics; A Tale from the Winter of '77; The Art Critics; Down in the Dumps; Wonder Wart-hog Goes on Welfare!; #113 The Urban Equalizer
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 08:26:46. [CVDB175909] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 20:49:32. [Issue ID 277148]

ComicInfo.Characters: Casualty of the Psychedelic Era,The Crusader,The Cat-Lady
ComicInfo.Summary:
Fat Freddy receives a package addressed to him containing his uncle who is now a talking parakeet.
Dorman brings his dog Ping with him to see Dr. Feelgood because he's embarrassed of the dog.
The sheriff tests out the noose on his hangin' tree.
E. Z. is at the doctor because of his terrible fever.
The hippie tells a story about the sixties involving a draft counselor.
A national racing competition to weed out incompetent drivers.
The Friend of All Lonely Soldiers on Guard Duty offers Dan some of the finest smoke in the world.
A look at collectors who are in reality anal retentives.
A practical technique to enforce good behavior while driving.
The hippie builds an energy focus amplifier.
For a nominal fee, the Reverend offers to pack a blessing with each meal-box of chicken.
The hippie tells the kids what it was like to trip in the sixties.
Failing to sleep before dawn.
E. Z. and friend listen in on members of the White Shoes 'n' Belt conspiracy.
The sheriff orders E. Z. to shut off the heat on his mighty warm cabin.
The hippie babysits his housemates's two-year-old toddler.
The trial of Eagerhard Ragriches, founder of Eager Beaver Training Seminars (EBST).
Connoisseurs of bad art.
The Nerd, trying to improve his lot on life, applies for welfare.
Philbert is fired from his newspaper job so he goes to apply for welfare. After transforming into Wonder Wart-Hog, he comes across several famous super heroes waiting ahead of him in line.
Shelton's design for car of the future, the Urban Equalizer.
